extendedInfo.description: Moon remote control can control GOM Player of the PC via Wi-Fi or 3G Internet. If you have a router, a wireless LAN can be controlled using the GOM Player is directly connected to the Internet via 3G Internet, you can control the GOM Player. GOM Player of the functions of the following functions can be controlled. - GOM Player Run / stop - play / pause - previous / next video playback - the previous / next video navigation - Volume control / mute - to full screenMoon remote control remote server program on the PC www.sd9.co.kr Run, you will have to take on.Thank you.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t get the file off the developer\'s site. Found it online easily though. App works perfectly and is so easy to set up it doesn\'t matter that it\'s not in English.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motorola Defy & Huawei Sonic U8650
reviews.comment: Work on Motorola Defy (Gingerbread), with problems. Firewall in most cases MUST be disabled or set up for server application. On Huawei Sonic U8650 \"work\" :-( ....Beacuse screen resolution only top left corner is usable. Only 6 functions are available (On/Off, Back,Left,Top,OK,Down). Without English (or full multilanguage support) only 2 start,sorry....  HR Radi na Motoroli Defy (Gingerbread),ali naravno sa problemima. Firewall u ve\304\207ini slu\304\215ajeva mora biti islju\304\215en ili pode\305\241en da ne blokira serversku aplikaciju. na Huawei U8650 \"radi\" :-(. Zbog male rezolucije ekrana, samo gornji lijevi dio aplikacije je upotrebljiv, stoga radi samo 6 funkcija. (Uklju\304\215i/Isklju\304\215i, Nazad,Lijevo,Gore,OK,Dolje) Naravno nedostaje barem engleski prijevod,a jo\305\241 da nam je hrvatski? Ma sre\304\207i nikad kraja. TZa sada samo dvije zvijezdice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great software
reviews.comment: Thanks for the FREE software. Works great. People should not rate poorly because they\'re unable to read Korean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: derp
reviews.comment: \'worst app in market\' hyperbole much? this app works fine

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: App is very good, does what it should. Only con is that the server is in korean. Even so,managed to set it up. Works just fine.
reviews.author: Alex V

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: No english No english on the server. Does not show up propperly on smaller screens ( optimus one) .

reviews.title: Worst app in Market
reviews.comment: Its not working.. plus, its server program is in Korean language. There\'s no way to tweak anything for English guy..
